RMX2020.changelog: NOTE: For Realme UI 1.0 FW only.

alioth.changelog: - overlays: Improve physical location of side fps - parts: Thermal settings app list improvement - Update blobs and tree to V13.0.2.0.SKHMIXM - Force set vendor.display.{idle_time,idle_time_inactive} to 0 - Enable debug.sf.enable_hwc_vds - Misc fixes and upstream changes. Kernel changelog: - input: misc: aw8697_haptic: Upgrade from zeus-s-oss - ARM64: dts: alioth: Use new awinic haptics configuration - Misc fixes and upstream changes. - Installation instruction: https://forum.xda-developers.com/t/rom-12-0-0-alioth-aliothin-arrowos-12-0-beta.4348617/post-85790097 - Recommend use with fw part MIUI V13.0.2.0.RKHMIXM (A12 Global) !!!

lavender.changelog:
- Flatten APEXs for performance
- Added OpenGL ES and update Vulkan dEQP feature flags
- Switched default camera app to GCamGo-V2
- Now we use 4G icon instead of LTE in status bar
- Improved thermal profile app listing
- Enabled vibration effect in more environments
- Uprev bluetooth audio HIDL impl to 2.1
- Other fixes and improvements

miatoll.changelog:
• Upstreamed kernel to 4.14.261
• Switch to AOSP clang 14.0.1
• Adapt sepolicy to Android 12
• Remove enable_advanced_sf_offset prop
• Disable unspecialized app process pool
• Attach vendor_property_type to properties
• Specify vendor_fp_prop as vendor public prop
• Allow ioctl to zram_swap for performance
• Add aux camera packagelist prop to system props
• Update the transcoding operating rate
• Set SSR restart_level in init.qcom.rc
• Label more wakeup nodes
• Label idle_state sysfs nodes
• Made transition animation a bit faster
• Limit screen recorder frame rate to 60fps
• Adjusting screen timeouts
• Dont inherit updatable_apex.mk
• Disable partial FB excl rect
• Disable global mode and CDMA choices
• Show 4G icon for all carriers
• Only make recovery permissive on non production builds
• Remove TxPower2g and 5g from wifi config file
• Disable all wifi related logging
• Fix OTA auto-flashing with encrypted f2fs
• Set media vol steps to 25
• Kill IMS logspam with fire
• Update config_safe_media_volume_index
• Slightly increase the minimum brightness level
• Use FUSE passthrough by default
• Update vendor security patch level
• Switched back to OpenGL as default GPU renderer
• Import and build GPS stack from LA.UM.9.1.r1-11500-SMxxx0.0
• Increase gps batch size to max
• Lower gps debug level
• Localise NTP to improve GPS TTFF

surya.changelog: - Update blobs to V12.5.5.0.RJGMIXM - Update IMS blobs from sweet A12 - Misc fixes and upstream changes. Note: Clean flash is MUST for arrow-12.0 (Android 12) !!!

sweet.changelog:
28/02/2022
• Updated blobs from MIUI 13 v13.0.2.0 Global
• Fixed Ok Google
• Updated GPS to LA.UM.9.1.r1-11500-SMxxx0.0
• Fixed OTA updates

12/11/2021
• Improved power management
• Switched back to schedutil governor
• Cleaned unneeded vendor libraries

28/10/2021
• Fixed cutout color being inverted with the "Force dark theme" setting
• Fixed minimum frequency being 1248MHz
• Fixed WFD
• Added Spanish translations to the device specific settings
